Class SessionController

java.lang.Object
com.example.full_connection.Controller.SessionController
@CrossOrigin(origins="http://localhost:5173") @RestController @RequestMapping("/api/sessions") public class SessionController extends Object
Controller for managing session-related operations. This class provides endpoints for handling user sessions and related data. Endpoints: - Start, update, and end user sessions. - Retrieve session statistics and details. Dependencies: - SessionService for session management logic.
